Description: Location Location! Short walk/drive to Metro. This home boast gleaming hdwd floors on main and upper levels 3 bd office 3.5 bath granite counters & SS appliances. Spacious deck overlooking fenced yard great for grilling & entertaining. Basement has office/den with full size window bath family room and FP plenty of storage and walks out to patio. Community pool & next to Blueberry Hills Pk

Description: Beautiful townhouse in great conditions and a convenient location to Rockville. Minutes from Shady Grove metro and Rt 370. All hardwood floors on main and upper levels Whole house newly painted. Wood burning fireplace deck off of living room patio off of walkout basement with new floor backs to woods small cul-de-sac 2 parking spaces. Please send viewing request to schedule viewing.

Features:
* High Speed Internet Access
* Air Conditioning
* Smoke Free
